name: SupportJoshuaAndNatasha
_source: speak;Joshua;Hey, I've been hearing good things about you lately.|Everyone's real happy you've been helping to heal them.
speak;Natasha;Really?|That's nice to hear.|I do what little I can, but I'm glad if I've been helpful.
speak;Joshua;Oh, you have been, rest assured.|You don't just mend flesh.|Your smile eases all our pain.|So, I may have lost our bet...|but everything seems to have turned out for the best, right?
speak;Natasha;Joshua...|I just do what I can to help and to stay out of everyone's way.

speak;Joshua;I'm just saying, you've saved a lot of lives out there.|We've got other healers, I know, but you're more than that.|You're special.|I may be the most cynical of our lot, but even I can see that.
speak;Joshua;Don't be so humble.|You deserve the praise.
speak;Joshua;Well, I do.|So keep it up.
speak;Joshua;Watch out!|Nngh!!|An arrow!?|Did someone set up a trap for us?|Or is there someone here?|An archer?|Where is he?
speak;Natasha;Joshua!|You saved me.|Thank goodness you were near.
speak;Joshua;Yeah, well...|I just happened to be in the neighborhood is all.
speak;Natasha;You make light of it, but I truly appreciate that you were nearby.
speak;Natasha;I'm fine, thank you.|But it's only thanks to you, Joshua.|You saved me.|I'll try to be more attentive to my surroundings.

speak;Joshua;Yeah, well...It's not always easy, you know?|Especially when you're working.|You concentrate pretty hard when you're doing your healing thing.|Just focus on your work, and I'll keep an eye on you.|Sound fair?
speak;Natasha;Oh, no...|I couldn't ask you to spend all your time protecting me.
speak;Joshua;What, you don't want me to?
speak;Natasha;It's not that at all!|I rather like- |
speak;Joshua;Say, you want to make a bet?
speak;Natasha;Another...|bet?|Right here?|In the middle of this battlefield?|What did you intend to bet on this time?
speak;Joshua;That you're gonna fall for me, sooner or later.
speak;Natasha;Oh...|This isn't the time for jokes...|I-I just don't know.
speak;Joshua;Hey, don't go running off!|Sigh...|I wasn't even joking...
speak;Natasha;Joshua, are you all right?|Do you need medical atten-
speak;Joshua;Natasha, how did you get here so quickly?
speak;Natasha;I just...I happened to be in the neighborhood.|Are you hurt?
speak;Joshua;Ugh.|Yeah...|But it's only a scratch.|Still, if you could...|take care of it.IPlease?
speak;Joshua;Thanks......|Say, Natasha.|Want to make a bet?
speak;Natasha;On what?|If this is another of your little jokes, I-
speak;Joshua;Will I make you happy?|That's what we'll bet on.|Are you in, or what?
speak;Joshua;That's everything I've got.|I can't up the ante any more.|So how about it?|Are you in?
speak;Joshua;Look into my eyes, and decide for yourself.
speak;Joshua;“I serve the people,” is that it?|Listen, does it make any difference if you serve them in Grado or Renais?|You can come with me.|It'll work out, you'll see.|I'll make it work.
speak;Natasha;What I'm betting is my future.|My happiness.
speak;Joshua;Natasha......|I can't afford to lose this one.
speak;Natasha;You're right...|And I hope from the bottom of my heart that you win.
speak;Joshua;Don't worry.|In a pinch, I never lose.|Well, I mean, I lose sometimes.|But not this time!
speak;Natasha;At least...you won our last bet.
speak;Joshua;Hm?|Oh!|Oh, yeah...|That you'd fall for me.
speak;Joshua;That was easy.|This bet, this is going to be a tough one.|I'm gonna have to work at it.|But knowing that I've won one bet already, at least I've got that.
speak;Natasha;This war is terrible...|but at least it brought us together.
